subject: Automobile Racing
Deaths (Obituaries)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Mr. Parks, a former transporter of moonshine, was at the gathering that led to the founding of Nascar, and was the owner of its first championship team.
snippet: Mr. Parks, a former transporter of moonshine, was at the gathering that led to the founding of Nascar, and was the owner of its first championship team.
